help:
Hi! I need your name to find your records. Once I have it, I'll ask for your date of birth to verify it with your records.
If you want to switch user, just ask and we can start again. Or type 'exit' to exit the system.
Once I have your name and date of birth, I can help you delete, retrieve or change some of your data on record. I can assist with any of the following:
-name
-age
-gender
-blood type
-medical condition
-date of admission
-doctor
-hospital
-insurance provider
-billing amount
-room number
-admission type
-discharge date
-medication
-test results
